snippet: Groups supporting an overhaul said they were planning a mobilization next month to press the House of Representatives to vote on a bill giving legal status to illegal immigrants.
abstract: Groups supporting an immigration overhaul say they are planning a mobilization in October to press the House of Representatives to vote on a bill giving legal status to illegal immigrants.
lead_paragraph: Groups supporting an overhaul said they were planning a mobilization next month to press the House of Representatives to vote on a bill giving legal status to illegal immigrants.
